game.name: Train Simulator: Southern Class 421 ‘4CIG’ EMU Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The 4CIG is a classic ‘slam door’ electric multiple unit and is now available in Southern livery with scenarios for the London to Brighton Expansion Pack.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The 4CIG is a classic ‘slam door’ electric multiple unit and is now available in Southern livery with scenarios for the London to Brighton Expansion Pack.
